summary: OOOOHHHH YYYEEAAAHHH!!!  \'Macho Man\' Randy Savage, intercontinental World Heavyweight Champion, now available in dragon form!
descriptionHtml:
OOOOHHHH YYYEEAAAHHH!!!  \'Macho Man\' Randy Savage, intercontinental World Heavyweight Champion, now available in dragon form!

Install:

Copy the data folder in the archive to your Skyrim folder.
In the launcher, ensure that \'Load Loose Files\' is checked.

Non-nexus mirrors:

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=HQDQEZ4V
http://www.mediafire.com/?m5u8bv3vxhe9i8z
http://www.fileserve.com/file/W5pPX5e/MachoDragonMod.zip
author: FancyPantz
